overview: Here's the original Frisky Summer. Rounding out the set are two bonus solos. Do you remember the warm endless nights and the smell of the sun on your skin? Do you remember all the boys and all the trouble and all the fun? It's summer and you're horny all the time. So are your friends and it's so warm all day and night. You'll try anything once because you're young and you're so hot all the time. Who wants to wear clothes anyway? Besides, there's so much trouble to get into and so many things to try for the very first time with your best friends.
title: Frisky Summer 1: Best Friends
